metaData.title: Hiking trails - discover Rosia Montana
metaData.description: From light walks on the village streets for visiting the historical center or the roman galleries, to hiking trails along the lakes, mountains, mining industry and others touristic sights. See also guided tours info.

specificArticles.textContent: Our village is surrounded by mountains, lakes, heritage buildings, ancient roman galleries and mining industry. So, if you come to Ro»ôia Montana, don't visit just the museum and the local store, because the area has much more to offer. Check the trails below and find the ones you like, based on the touristic attractions you would like to see. The maps of the trails are made with google maps, so you can zoom in, see them in satellite mode or access them from any device. Under each trail you'll find indications estimated by us (round trip distance, duration). The indications within the map are being estimated by google.
